means: （英国公共汽车或火车上的）查票员

sentence.Network_en: The Inspector remembered her as a small, mousy woman, invariably worried.
sentence.Network_cn: 检察官记得，她是一个矮小、羞怯、总是闷闷不乐的人。

sentence.Network_en: Inspector Banbury came up to see her, but she sent him away.
sentence.Network_cn: 班伯里巡官过来看她，却被她打发走了。

sentence.Network_en: The Inspector took out a handker-chief and mopped his brow.
sentence.Network_cn: 检察员掏出手帕，擦了擦眉头。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin, from inspicere (see inspect)

entry.def: An inspector is a person, usually employed by a government agency, whose job is to find out whether people are obeying official regulations.

example.ex: The mill was finally shut down by state safety inspectors.
example.tran: 工厂终于遭国家安全检查员关闭了。

entry.tran: (英国警察中职位低于警司高于巡佐的)巡官,督察
entry.def: In Britain, an inspector is an officer in the police who is higher in rank than a sergeant and lower in rank than a superintendent.

example.ex: Last week gunmen attacked Mogadishu airport killing a police inspector...
example.tran: 上周持枪歹徒袭击了摩加迪沙机场，杀死了一名警察巡官。

example.ex: I got on the phone to Inspector Joplin at Scotland Yard.
example.tran: 我与伦敦警察厅的乔普林巡官通过电话了。

entry.tran: (美国警察中仅次于总警监的)督察长
entry.def: In the United States, an inspector is an officer in the police who is next in rank to a superintendent or police chief.

example.tran: 旧金山警察局督察长托尼·卡米莱里

auth_sentence.content: You knew because Inspector Reid kept pointing them out.

auth_sentence.content: The inspector loved it so much it was palpable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The inspector loved it so much it was palpable.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.en: a system of local inspectors to help enforce presidential decrees
sentences.cn: 有利于执行总统法令的地方监察员体制

sentences.en: An inspector checked the standard of work.
sentences.cn: 视察员查验工作的质量。
